titles.title: Montana Cemetery Act of 2005

A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain land in the Beaverhead-Deerlodge and Kootenai National Forests, Montana, to Jefferson County and Sanders County, Montana, for use as cemeteries and other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 4/25/2005--Introduced. Montana Cemetery Act of 2005 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, acting through the Chief of the Forest Service, to convey certain National Forest System land in Montana known as the Elkhorn Cemetery and the Noxon Cemetery to Jefferson County and Sanders County, Montana, respectively.
